author: Nitesh J
title: A classic Taj property in the heart of the city
text: This hotel is a very very classic property an iconic property in New York .The location is the best just on 5th ave and next to central park. The staff is very warm, the rooms and the corridors are a bit dated. The concierge is very helpful and has amazing recommendations and helps you in every way possible. I was there for a business trip next time will definitely stay there with my family or friends as well.
